title: Fix symbolic for max pool in all dimensions
body_html:
This PR fixes #2717 . In the previous code, padding was concatenated twice as much as the other arguments, e.g. in 2D

    .is_("kernel_shape", [kernel_size] * 2)
    .is_("pads", [padding] * 4)
    .is_("dilations", [dilation] * 2)

I can't see why though.

There was a discussion on Slack #autograd with @ezyang on ONNX not accounting for channels for dimensions other than 2. This will be fixed shortly in ONNX. This PR was done with that fix in mind.

body:
This PR fixes #2717 . In the previous code, padding was concatenated twice as much as the other arguments, e.g. in 2D
```
    .is_("kernel_shape", [kernel_size] * 2)
    .is_("pads", [padding] * 4)
    .is_("dilations", [dilation] * 2)
```
I can't see why though.

There was a discussion on Slack #autograd with @ezyang on ONNX not accounting for channels for dimensions other than 2. This will be fixed shortly in ONNX. This PR was done with that fix in mind.
